page.title: 14MARKET RASEN-YOUNG LEISURE
page.content: For a small town there are many chances for children to pursue their interests. The Sports Centre provides roller skating and other indoor sports while Adult Education gives swimming, Gymnastics and games activities.There are also ballet classes for girls.The sports clube themselves give youngsters the chance to play. There are two playing areas which have swings etc. where the children can organise there own games. There are flourishing Guide and Scout groups, the latter having just completed their own headquarters, catering for about 70 children in each group. Each of the churches have their own activities for the young, Crusaders or Sunday School.There is ,of course, the country paths and lanes where cycling is safe for the children to explore the countryside.
